comments.text:
Per discussion in bug 666099, the workflow of some users include selective deletion of cookies, now provided in the Data Manager. A confirmation dialog was introduced as part of bug 476175 for SM 2.0 which was inherited by the Data Manager, and similar dialogs exist for the other tabs.

For users frequently removing entries in the Data Manager and who know what they are doing, the confirmation dialog appears as an unnecessary/redundant step. Thus, similar to other dialogs of this kind, the suggestion is to add a "Don't show this again" to the dialog(s).
